name: Re-Pair (Dividebyzer0 team)
description:
“Best game of GGJ20” at Moscow’s jam site IThub

As a newbie cupid you face a trivial task - save your boss’s zoo from extinction until her return. «Just shoot them with your love arrows to breed» she said. «Piece of cake» she said. But all goes wrong when you’ve shot two different animals...

Made for GGJ2020 by Dividebyzer0 team & friends
